{{also|Tausend}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|dūsunt}}, akin to Old Saxon {{m|osx|thūsund}}. Ultimately from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*þūsundī}}. Compare Dutch {{m|de|duizend}}, West Frisian {{m|fy|tûzen}}, English ''[[thousand]]'', Danish {{m|da|tusind}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈtaʊ̯zn̩t/|/ˈtaʊ̯zənt/}} * {{audio|de|De-tausend.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} [[thousand]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|eintausend}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Derived terms==== *{{l|de|tausendfach}} *{{l|de|tausendjährig}} *{{l|de|tausendmal}} ====Related terms==== {{rel3|de |zweitausend |fünftausend |zehntausend |hunderttausend |vieltausend |abertausend |zigtausend }}
